69 template <class ModelInterface>
70 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::AttachOrSetObject(ModelInterface* objectPtr)
71 {
72  EnsureModelDetached();
73 
74  imod::IModel* modelPtr = dynamic_cast<imod::IModel*>(objectPtr);
75 
76  bool retVal = false;
77  if ((modelPtr != NULL) && modelPtr->AttachObserver(this)){
78  retVal = true;
79  }
80 
81  m_objectPtr = objectPtr;
82 
83  return retVal;
84 }
85 
86 
87 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
88 
89 template <class ModelInterface>
90 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
91 {
92  m_objectPtr = CastFromModel(modelPtr);
93 
94  I_IF_DEBUG(
95  if (m_objectPtr == NULL){
96  QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(ModelInterface).name();
97 
98  qDebug("Data model interface is not supported by this observer. Expected interface is: %s", qPrintable(exptectedObjectInterface));
99  }
100  )
101 
102  if ((m_objectPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
103  return true;
104  }
105 
106  BaseClass::EnsureModelDetached();
107 
108  return false;
109 }
110 
111 
112 template <class ModelInterface>
113 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
114 {
115  if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
116  // If model was correctly attached m_objectPtr cannot be NULL. OnDetach returns true only if model was correctly attached.
117  Q_ASSERT(m_objectPtr != NULL);
118 
119  m_objectPtr = NULL;
120 
121  return true;
122  }
123 
124  return false;
125 }
126

131 ModelInterface* TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::CastFromModel(imod::IModel* modelPtr) const
132 {
133  return dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
134 }
